tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE competitor_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_name VARCHAR(255),
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_date DATE,
    marketing_strategy_adjustment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MarketingStrategies (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
    strategy_type VARCHAR(50),
    target_audience VARCHAR(100),
    implementation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Competitors (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    industry VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    headquarters VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    revenue DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    employee_count INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    budget DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE MarketingStrategies (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    target_audience VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    budget DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_performance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT,
    performance_date DATE,
    performance_metric VARCHAR(50),
    performance_value INT
);
